personalInfo.name: Sagar Subedi
personalInfo.title: Software Engineer
personalInfo.summary: Java Developer specializing in scalable systems and microservices. Experienced in building high-performance applications using Spring Boot, Angular, and Go. Passionate about open-source contributions, distributed systems, and cloud technologies.

experience.description: Developed and optimized healthcare data analysis tools using Java, Spring Boot, and Angular. Worked on Apache Camel for data pipelines and enhanced client-side web applications with Angular. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver secure and efficient software solutions.
Developed mobile apps for individuals with neural conditions using Flutter. Integrated Bluetooth communication with ESP32 microcontrollers for rhythmic massage therapy.
Assisted in network optimization and troubleshooting. Gained hands-on experience in network diagnostics and performance analysis.

education.degree: Bachelor's in Computer Science and Information Technology
education.description: Focused on software development, data structures, and distributed computing. Graduated with a distinction.

projects.name: Litcord
projects.description: A video/audio calling app with text chat inspired by Discord. Developed using WebRTC, Spring Boot, and Angular. Features include server channels, peer-to-peer connections, and a scalable architecture.

projects.name: Distributed E-Learning Platform
projects.description: An e-learning platform built with microservices architecture. Features include user management, course creation, and video streaming.

certifications.name: Java Microservices Bootcamp
certifications.description: Focused on advanced Java, microservices, and cloud architecture.
